body_html:
Thank you for your response. All the dtypes in x appear to be <dtype: 'float32'>.

Maybe I'm not doing this the right way, and you can point me in the right direction. Is there something obviously wrong with how I am trying to run rnn on multiple GPU, using the param server paradigm? I'm happy to provide more code if that helps.

body:
Thank you for your response. All the dtypes in x appear to be `<dtype: 'float32'>`.

Maybe I'm not doing this the right way, and you can point me in the right direction. Is there something obviously wrong with how I am trying to run rnn on multiple GPU, using the param server paradigm? I'm happy to provide more code if that helps.
